question: Which international football club won the Premier League title, with seven games left?
explanation:
Liverpool, the professional football club based in Liverpool, England, has recently won the Premier League title, with seven games left to play.
The Liverpool team was confirmed as Champions after thirty years, since they held the title in 1989-90. In this season, Liverpool have an irrefutable 23-point lead over Manchester City. In the last 12 months Liverpool have won the Champions League, the UEFA Super Cup and World Club Cup.
